project.description: Launch the script runBuild_v2.0.php as user 'build' on fossbuild to build the packages

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: pwd; id; cd ../..; pwd; export http_proxy=http://web-proxy.cce.hp.com:8088/; ./runBuild_v2.0.php -V 2.6.2 -t ssh fossology@fossology.org "rm -rf /var/www/fossology.org/htdocs/nightlybuild/2.6.2/current/" scp -r /var/ftp/pub/fossology/2.6.2/testing/current/ fossology@fossology.org:/var/www/fossology.org/htdocs/nightlybuild/2.6.2/

email.subject: $PROJECT_DEFAULT_SUBJECT
email.body:
$BUILD_STATUS

$PROJECT_DEFAULT_CONTENT

Excerpt of build errors:
${BUILD_LOG_REGEX, regex="error", linesBefore=5, linesAfter=5, maxMatches=5, showTruncatedLines=true, escapeHtml=true, matchedLineHtmlStyle="color:red"}

email.subject: $PROJECT_DEFAULT_SUBJECT
email.body:
$BUILD_STATUS

Packages are available here: Latest FO packages (Built nightly from top of tree

  • Debian Squeeze sources.list
    • deb http://www.fossology.org/nightlybuild/2.6.0/current/debian/ 6.0 contrib
  • Debian Wheezy sources.list
    • deb http://www.fossology.org/nightlybuild/2.6.0/current/debian/ 7.0 contrib
  • Ubuntu 12.04 sources.list
    • deb http://www.fossology.org/nightlybuild/2.6.0/current/ubuntu/ 12.04 contrib
  • Ubuntu 12.10 sources.list
    • deb http://www.fossology.org/nightlybuild/2.6.0/current/ubuntu/ 12.10 contrib
  • Ubuntu 13.04 sources.list
    • deb http://www.fossology.org/nightlybuild/2.6.0/current/ubuntu/ 13.04 contrib
  • Ubuntu 13.10 sources.list
    • deb http://www.fossology.org/nightlybuild/2.6.0/current/ubuntu/ 13.10 contrib
  • Fedora repo
    • baseurl=http://www.fossology.org/nightlybuild/2.6.0/current/fedora/$releasever/$basearch/
  • CentOS / RHEL repo
    • baseurl=http://www.fossology.org/nightlybuild/2.6.0/current/rhel/$releasever/$basearch/


    $PROJECT_DEFAULT_CONTENT

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent:
...for $PROJECT_NAME

Console Output is Here

Changes for this commit: ${CHANGES, format="" }

%m
